/* USE : PosPostpaidMapper.getMemberList */ SELECT tmmpb.HQ_OFFICE_CD, tmmpb.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tmmpb.MEMBR_NO, tmm.MEMBR_NM, tmmpb.POSTPAID_AMT, tmmpb.POSTPAID_IN_AMT, tmmpb.POSTPAID_BAL_AMT, (SELECT SUM(tmmtb.REQUEST_AMT) AS REQUEST_AMT FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_TAX_BILL tmmtb WHERE tmmtb.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tmmpb.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tmmtb.MEMBR_NO = tmmpb.MEMBR_NO AND tmmtb.STATUS_FG = '1') AS REQUEST_AMT, TO_CHAR(to_date(tmmpb.REG_DT, 'yyyyMMddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS REG_DT , tmmpb.REG_ID, CASE WHEN tmmpb.POSTPAID_BAL_AMT > 0 THEN '세금계산서 발행요청' ELSE '' END AS DEPOSIT
FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_PAID_BALANCE tmmpb, TB_MB_MEMBER tmm, TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tmmpb.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tmmpb.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tmm.MEMBR_NO = tmmpb.MEMBR_NO AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tmmpb.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tms.STORE_CD = tmmpb.STORE_CD ORDER BY tmmpb.MOD_DT DESC, tmmpb.MEMBR_NO ASC
